phone-select.no-stock-magsafe: All chargers have been given away

lead-in.title: iPhone 14 Series Recontract Offer
lead-in.desc: Selected SmarTone customers simply re-contract and pay for the phone in full, you will be guaranteed with your choice of iPhone model and colour for pick up on designated date and store!

term.text1: You will be notified by email and SMS when your iPhone is ready. Within 48 hours upon receipt of notification, please complete the order via CARE App. Your Handset Discount can be applied while completing the payment and order.
term.text1NoVoucher: You will be notified by email and SMS when your iPhone is ready. Within 48 hours upon receipt of notification, please complete the order online via CARE App.
term.text2: iPhone xxxxxx will be available for pre-order on DD MMM. You can keep and exercise your SmarT Pass within 48 hours after pre-order starts.

phone-select.reach-limit: You have reached the maximum pre-order quantity

yob.label: Year of Birth
yob.require: Please enter your correct year of birth

option.delivery: Delivery (Exclusive for specially selected SmarTone Plus members)

addressLine1.helperText: Please enter your English address, excluding special characters e.g. -&>*!%

addressLine2.helperText: Please enter your English address, excluding special characters e.g. -&>*!%

reminder.storage-remind-message: You can {link} to visit regular pre-order site to pre-order other iPhone 14 models, but you will not be able to enjoy “Smart Priority Phone” Pickup Service and free MagSafe Charger.
reminder.plan-remind-message: You can {link} to visit regular pre-order site to pre-order iPhone 14 and select other service plans when you pick up the phone, but you will not be able to enjoy “Smart Priority Phone” Pickup Service and free MagSafe Charger.
reminder.time-remind-message: You could also {link} to visit regular pre-order site to pre-order iPhone 14, but you will not be able to enjoy “Smart Priority Phone” Pickup Service and free MagSafe Charger.
reminder.preorder-redpass: Are you sure you want to leave this page?
reminder.alert-message: Once you leave, your selections will not be saved.
reminder.timeslot-not-fit: “Smart Priority Phone” Pickup Service is only available at the above location, date and time.

note.all-right-reserved: TM and © {year} Apple Inc. All rights reserved.
note.copyright: Copyright {year}. All rights reserved. SmarTone Mobile Communications Limited.

select-phone.remark: You will be notified by email and SMS when your iPhone is ready. Within 48 hours upon receipt of notification, please complete the order via CARE App.
select-phone.remark-voucher: You will be notified by email and SMS when your iPhone is ready. Within 48 hours upon receipt of notification, please complete the order via CARE App. Your Handset Discount can be applied during checkout.

term.declare: I fully understand and accept the below Terms & Conditions:

error.system-busy: System Busy, please try again later.
error.handset-no-quota: The pre-order quota for your selected iPhone model is full, Please select another model.
error.magsafe-no-quota: Sorry, the free MagSafe Charger have all been given away.
error.max-reserve-ticket: The pre-order quota for your selected iPhone model is full, Please select another model.
error.info-hkid-not-match: Year of Birth or HKID/Passport input incorrectly
error.info-yob-not-match: Year of Birth or HKID/Passport input incorrectly
error.info-invalid: Personal infomation is incorrect, please try again.

select-pickup-date.remark: If the credit card used for the order payment in next step is not in your name, please ask the credit card holder to download, fill in and sign the Authorisation Form. Please bring all the above items and the copy of the credit card used for the order payment when visiting your selected store.
select-pickup-date.remark1: Please pick up your iPhone at the selected date, timeslot and store.
select-pickup-date.remark2: If you are unable to pick up the phone in person, you can fill in and sign the “Authorisation letter ” to authorise a representative to pick up the phone on your behalf. The authorised person is required to present his/her original HKID/Passport, the original authorisation letter and photocopy of the front side of the credit card or the screen captured image of PayMe / AlipayHK / WeChat Pay HK transaction details used for payment of the pre-order.
select-pickup-date.remark3: If you are unable to pick up the phone at the scheduled date and timeslot, you will be requeued and you will have to contact our WhatsApp Assistant for arrangement. Pickup date is subject to product supply

select-delivery-date.remark1: Please contact our 24-hr customer service hotline at 2281 8833 if you have any enquiries on the delivery arrangements

thank-you.heading: Thank You for Your Pre-order
thank-you.sub-title: You will receive a confirmation email and SMS.
thank-you.footer: If you didn’t receive the confirmation email after pre-ordering, please check your spam folder. To ensure you receive important emails from us in the future, please add comms@service.smartone.com and advice@comms.smartone.com to your address book.
thank-you.footer2: Please call 2880 2688 if the issue persists.
thank-you.footer2-whitelist: Please call 2281 8833 if the issue persists.
thank-you.lead-in: You will be notified by email and SMS when your iPhone is ready. Within 48 hours upon receipt of notification, please schedule to collect your iPhone and complete the order via CARE App, ensuring you can get your iPhone promptly.

delivery-terms.term1: Your iPhone will be unboxed and activated before shipping
delivery-terms.term2: You will be notified by email and SMS when your iPhone is ready. Within 48 hours upon receipt of notification, please select a delivery date, enter the delivery address and proceed with the payment via CARE App to complete the order.
delivery-terms.term3: Delivery is not available if you have selected iPhone for Life or instalment plans
delivery-terms.term4: Delivery districts do not include areas outside the available options.
delivery-terms.term5: Delivery Service Terms and Conditions

voucher.remark: All models, except iPhone 15 Pro Max 1TB, are available in stores. No online pre-order required. Your entitled handset discount offer can be applied in stores.

location-selector.heading: Please select a store for pickup

delivery.remark: The delivery information will be needed to provide when the iPhone is ready to collect

review.confirm: Please review and confirm your order.

no-quota-for-delivery: The delivery service quota is full. Please select in-store pickup

order-select.title: Your Pre-Order
order-select.desc: Please check the status of your pre-ordered iPhone and complete the order.

delivery-remark-1: Your iPhone will be unboxed and activated before shipping
pay-online-to-enjoy-more: Pay online now to enjoy more benefits!
smooth-pickup-orange: Save more time and pay online now to pick up the phone in store within 15 minutes!
smooth-pickup: Pick up in store within 15 minutes to save you time
sales-assisted-payment: For in-store payment, please click here
please-paid-for-ip4l-at-store: If you want to pay at store or apply iPhone for Life, please click here
prepayment-description: Description. Will rebate xxx per month for the first 3 months mobile plan payment
datapass: FREE 2-day APAC Multi-Day Roaming Data Pack
sales-assisted-payment-iphone4life: You have selected iPhone for Life, please visit our stores to proceed with the payment
you-have-selected-iphone-for-life-please: You have selected iPhone for Life, please visit our stores to proceed with the payment
reminder-msg-online:
The online payment exclusive offer - FREE 2-day APAC Multi-Day Roaming Data Pack is not available for payments made in stores. If you are unable to pick up the phone and pay in store at the scheduled date and timeslot, you will be requeued automatically. Pickup date is subject to product supply and you will have to contact our WhatsApp Assistant.

We recommend paying online to save time and ensure you can get your iPhone promptly.
reminder-msg-offline:
If you are unable to pick up the phone and pay at store at the scheduled date and timeslot, you will be requeued automatically. Pickup date is subject to product supply and you will have to contact our WhatsApp Assistant.

We recommend paying online to save time and ensure you can get your iPhone promptly.
